cafe.game.tetris

Class Tetris

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • cafe.game.tetris.Tetris
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Tetris
extends java.applet.Applet
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Tetris like game.

    This version changes the behavior when the down arrow is pressed, make it more reasonable logically.

    Version:
    2.01 01/04/2002
    Author:
    Wen Yu, yuwen_66@yahoo.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
